0: Great location and loved the view from the pool
Really great breakfast complete with an omelet bar and soda fountain have never seen this at a hotel breakfast
And oh so sweet to be looking at those red taillights stuck in traffic as you are winding down in a nice suite
The hotel is beautiful and the rooms very spacious
Our suite had a nice view of the river and was very quiet
Growth room with a nice view
The room suite was simply awesome
Bed was comfortable and it was a large room
1: I will not be returning to the Embassy Suites in Tampa
Property is getting renovated and I was in one of the new rooms
Room service was available for a 25 mark up yikes
Room was clean but could get that at any hotel
I stay at embassy suites all of the time but this one I paid 3500 for one night which in my opinion was way over priced
Even better is the gorgeous view of the water
Normally Embassy Suites has good service and I enjoy my stay with the kids but not this location A waste of money
We checked in late 530 pm due to traffic and got the rooms shortly after 7 pm
Make sure you get a renovated room
2: The rooms provide for microwave sink and refrigerator
Poor management poor cleaning staff for the guest rooms and an absolutely complete lack of overall professionalism and gratitude towards Hilton Honors members
But keep in mind the trolley runs until 2 am we could hear the trolley bell from our room
They had overboked so my 2 double beds room was no longer available
We arrived late no room service menu in our suite but there are restaurant ads
Our room was not ready which was fine bc we arrived early but they were suppose to contact us by 3 to let us know when it is ready but never contacted us
Our first room besides the smell was honestly dirty and just not well taken care of
Not to mention they sell double the rooms the hotel has
Came in the night of the 28th and the service was horrible they did n’t have rooms for anyone because they were short staffed on maids to clean the rooms
The rooms are a bit tired
